task.title: Add Nodes to the New Node Group
task.shortdesc: To add nodes to a node group, you create rules that define which nodes should be included in the group.

step.cmd: On the Classification page, click to open the web_app_servers node group.
On the Rules tab, in the Fact field, type or select "osfamily."
On the Operator drop-down list, select is, and in the Value field, type "RedHat" or "Windows" depending on the type of OS you're using for your agent.
step.info: As you type in the rule, the number in the Node matches column changes to indicate how many nodes this rule will affect.

step.cmd: Click Add rule, and then click the commit button.
